Html:
Hey I know not all trinkets are working and up to date in a number of models.  I was just wondering what the timeline looks like for HolyPriest trinket modelling?  Next few weeks or will it be a while yet?

Given it's not updated currently, does anyone know a good way to model Forethought Talisman's proc in Rawr currently?

Forethought talisman is 3572(*1.06) healing over ~55 seconds.  Its a very underwhelming proc as you cannot really control when it lands and who it heals (in an aoe situation).

 

The trinkets system has been changed in Rawr 2.2 and until now I've focused on getting everything else right, but Trinkets are next on my todo list.

2.2.4 will include initial trinket updates for the HolyPriest module. (ShadowPriests have to wait a bit more).

 

Not every trinket has yet been added, but I think I caught the important ones, please post here if you have any questions.
